amendment.description: To modify the provisions relating to the availability to the public of intelligence funding information.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3903 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 55 - 37. Record Vote Number: 196.

Amendment SA 3903 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S10252; text: CR S10252) To modify the provisions relating to the availability to the public of intelligence funding information.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3903 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 55 - 37. Record Vote Number: 196.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3903 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Stevens.
